title: Paralyzed Patient Monitoring
description: – Developed a smart assistive communication system for paralyzed patients– Implemented eye-blink based communication using computer vision– Enabled wireless transmission of alerts to caregivers

title: Context-Resume RAG Chatbot
description: – Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) based resume chatbot– Automated resume ingestion and indexing using n8n workflows– Enabled context-aware question answering using vector searc
